Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.redis.client

Interface BulkResultHandler

  • public interface BulkResultHandler
    Handler for Redis commands that return a bulk string.

    Bulk strings are binary-safe and can contain any data. They are used for commands that return values stored in Redis.

    Commands returning bulk strings:

    • GET - returns the value or null
    • HGET - returns the field value or null
    • LPOP / RPOP - returns the popped element or null
    • GETEX - returns the value or null
    Author:
    Chris Burdess

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void handleError​(java.lang.String error, RedisSession session)
      Called when the command fails with a Redis error.
      void handleNull​(RedisSession session)
      Called when the command returns null.
      void handleResult​(byte[] value, RedisSession session)
      Called when the command succeeds with a non-null result.

    • Method Detail

      • handleResult

        void handleResult​(byte[] value,
                  RedisSession session)
        Called when the command succeeds with a non-null result.

        The result is returned as raw bytes. To convert to a string, use new String(value, StandardCharsets.UTF_8).

        Parameters:
        value - the result bytes
        session - the session for further operations

      • handleNull

        void handleNull​(RedisSession session)
        Called when the command returns null.

        Null is returned when:

        • The key does not exist (GET, HGET)
        • The list is empty (LPOP, RPOP)
        • The field does not exist (HGET)
        Parameters:
        session - the session for further operations

      • handleError

        void handleError​(java.lang.String error,
                 RedisSession session)
        Called when the command fails with a Redis error.
        Parameters:
        error - the error message from Redis
        session - the session for further operations
